    • Uses of Request in restlib

      Subclasses of Request in restlib 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  RequestWrapper
      An implementation of Request which forwards all its method calls to another instance of Request.

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Request RequestBuilder.build()
      Returns a newly-created Request instance based on the contents of the RequestBuilder.
